trans-unit.source: Represents a word or short phrase that can be recognized.

Using the members of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> class, you can specify three forms of a word: the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display%2A> form, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> form, and a custom <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> for the word.
trans-unit.target: Usando los miembros de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> (clase), puede especificar tres formas de una palabra: el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display%2A> formulario, el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> formulario y un personalizado <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> para la palabra.

trans-unit.source: If multiple words are stored in a single <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> object, each is treated as a different token internally and in the result.
trans-unit.target: Si varias palabras se almacenan en una sola <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> de objetos, cada uno se trata como un token distinto internamente y en el resultado.

trans-unit.source: This class represents the `token` element defined by the World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [Speech Recognition Grammar Specification (SRGS) Version 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).
trans-unit.target: Esta clase representa el `token` elemento definido por el World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) [especificación de gramática de reconocimiento de voz (SRGS) versión 1.0.](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=201761).

trans-unit.source: For information about the SRGS `token` element and details about its support by System.Speech, see [token Element](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632).
trans-unit.target: Para obtener información sobre la SRGS `token` elemento y detalles sobre su compatibilidad con System.Speech, consulte [token elemento](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3a9e8d64-7bd4-4188-a6f4-dbf28ea71632).

trans-unit.source: The text of the new <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" /> class instance.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" /> class and specifies the text to be recognized.

Creates a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> object whose <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> property is set initially to the value of the `text` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Crea un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> cuyos <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> propiedad se establece inicialmente en el valor de la `text` parámetro.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="text" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="text" /> is empty.
Gets or sets the display form of the text to be spoken.
A representation of the token as it should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Una representación del token tal y como se debe mostrar.

trans-unit.source: Although they typically represent the same value, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display%2A> form may be different than the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> form for a word or phrase in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.
trans-unit.target: Aunque normalmente representan el mismo valor, el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display%2A> formulario puede ser diferente que el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> forman una palabra o frase en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.

trans-unit.source: For example, the display form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> applies, is "United States of America".
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el formato de presentación puede ser un acrónimo, por ejemplo, "EE", mientras que el texto que se proporcionarán y a la que el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> se aplica, es "Estados Unidos".

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display" /> to <see langword="null" />.
An attempt is made to assign an empty string to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display" />.
Gets or sets the string that defines the pronunciation for the token.
Returns a string containing phones from the phonetic alphabet specified in <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet" />.
trans-unit.target: Devuelve una cadena que contiene los teléfonos del alfabeto fonético especificado en <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet" />.

trans-unit.source: Phones are letters or symbols that describe the sounds of speech.
trans-unit.target: Teléfonos son letras o símbolos que describen los sonidos de voz.

trans-unit.source: System.Speech supports three phonetic alphabets for specifying custom pronunciations: the Universal Phone Set (UPS), the Speech API (SAPI) Phone set, and the International Phonetic Alphabet (IPA).
trans-unit.target: System.Speech admite tres alfabetos fonético para especificar las pronunciaciones personalizadas: el conjunto teléfono Universal (UPS), el conjunto de teléfono de Speech API (SAPI) y el alfabeto fonético internacional (IPA).

trans-unit.source: The phones specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> must match the phonetic alphabet specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Los teléfonos especificados en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> debe coincidir con el alfabeto fonético especificado en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsDocument.PhoneticAlphabet%2A>.

trans-unit.source: See [Lexicons and Phonetic Alphabets](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) for more information.
trans-unit.target: Vea [léxicos y alfabetos fonético](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/435e3c6f-6834-4e5a-b0f6-c17b2275dc51) para obtener más información.

trans-unit.source: The phones specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> indicate how the contents of <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> should be pronounced for successful recognition.
trans-unit.target: Los teléfonos especificados en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> indicar cómo el contenido de <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> debe pronunciado para el reconocimiento correcto.

trans-unit.source: The speech recognition engine uses the pronunciation specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> to match speech input and returns the string contained by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> in the recognition result.
trans-unit.target: El motor de reconocimiento de voz utiliza la pronunciación especificada en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> para que coincida con la entrada de voz y devuelve la cadena que se encuentra por <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> en el resultado del reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: If the phones are not space-delimited or the specified string contains an unrecognized phone, the recognition engine does not recognize the specified pronunciation as a valid pronunciation of the word contained by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Si los teléfonos no están delimitados por espacios o la cadena especificada contiene un teléfono no reconocido, el motor de reconocimiento no reconoce la pronunciación especificada como una pronunciación válida de la palabra contenida <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Pronunciations specified in <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> take precedence over pronunciations specified in lexicons associated with a grammar or a recognition engine.
trans-unit.target: Pronunciaciones especificadas en <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> tienen prioridad sobre las pronunciaciones especificadas en léxicos asociados a una gramática o un motor de reconocimiento.

trans-unit.source: Also, the pronunciation in the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> property applies only to the single occurrence of the word or phrase contained by <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Además, la pronunciación en el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> propiedad solo se aplica a la aparición única de la palabra o frase contenida por <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The grammar in the following example contains slang words and also has an uncommon word: "whatchamacallit".
trans-unit.target: La gramática en el ejemplo siguiente contiene palabras jerga y tiene también una palabra poco común: "whatchamacallit".

trans-unit.source: Adding a custom, inline pronunciation using the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> property of the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> class can improve the accuracy of recognition for the word "whatchamacallit" as well as for the entire phrase that contains it.
trans-unit.target: Agregar un personalizado, pronunciación alineado con la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> propiedad de la <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken> clase puede mejorar la precisión del reconocimiento de la palabra "whatchamacallit", así como para la frase completa que lo contiene.

trans-unit.source: The example uses phones from the Microsoft Universal Phone Set (UPS) to define the custom pronunciations.
trans-unit.target: El ejemplo usa teléfonos desde el Microsoft Universal teléfono establecido (SAI o UPS) para definir las pronunciaciones personalizadas.

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation" /> to <see langword="null" />.
An attempt is made to assign an empty string to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation" />.
Gets or sets the written form of the word that should be spoken.
The text contained within the <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" /> class instance.
trans-unit.target: El texto contenido en el <see cref="T:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken" /> instancia de la clase.

trans-unit.source: Although they typically represent the same value, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> form may be different than the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display%2A> form for a word or phrase in a <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.
trans-unit.target: Aunque normalmente representan el mismo valor, el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> formulario puede ser diferente que el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display%2A> forman una palabra o frase en un <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken>.

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display%2A> form may be an acronym, such as "USA", while the text that will be spoken, and to which the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> applies, is "United States of America".
trans-unit.target: Por ejemplo, el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Display%2A> formulario puede ser un acrónimo, por ejemplo, "EE", mientras que el texto que se proporcionarán y a la que el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Pronunciation%2A> se aplica, es "Estados Unidos".

trans-unit.source: The default value for the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> property is an empty string—"".
trans-unit.target: El valor predeterminado para el <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text%2A> propiedad es una cadena vacía: "".

trans-unit.source: An attempt is made to set <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text" /> to <see langword="null" />.
An attempt is made to assign an empty string to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text" />.
An attempt is made to assign a string that contains a quotation mark (") to <see cref="P:System.Speech.Recognition.SrgsGrammar.SrgsToken.Text" />.
